title: Twenty men and a leader
creator_credit: BFI, Gaumont-British Instructional and Donald Carter
brief_description: A spare-time class of recreative gymnastics: corrective exercises, vaulting, hurdling, cartwheels, obsticle races and various other team games and competitions are included in this demonstration of basic physical culture.
description: A spare-time class of recreative gymnastics: corrective exercises, vaulting, hurdling, cartwheels, obsticle races and various other team games and competitions are included in this demonstration of basic physical culture.
